reviewText: I ordered this DVD because of an article I read in Yahoo News about relationships.  After reviewing the material, I must say it was very informative.  Male and female relationships seem a mystery at times but I learned new strategies and gained more understanding about them from this DVD.  The only reason I gave it a 3 star rating was because it is a tape taken at a training session.  The quality of picture is not as crisp and clear.  Material is great, quality of taping is secondary.  Would recommend purchase anyway.
